Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_nd5hd4EO3U1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/okIdfgh7OX8" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>After taking some time to blow things apart in <em>KSP: Economic Boom</em>, we thought you might need just a little break to watch <strong>FleetAdmiralJ</strong> put things <em>together</em>. Here, he shows off his scale VAB done in Minecraft.</p>

*whistle*

Wow, that looks epic.

Minecraft is so awesome to build with. Thats some impressive work and must have taken some time. Great job, FleetAdmiralJ.

Minecraft is explosive to blow up with TNT !!
It was a very tideous Project but it was worth it, Fleet
I still kinda don't want to know how many blocks went into that thing...

I still kinda don't want to know how many blocks went into that thing...

Dang, you know what we forgot?

We should have put a Banana for scale next to it
That is awesome, hats off to you. How long did it take you?

i'm not sure how many hours, but we basically spent 8 to 10 Saturdays with at least 2 or 3 people, sometime more, working several hours each Saturday, and then people working occasionally in between as well.
That is amazing. I wonder how long it would take you to make the whole KSC? +rep to both you

That is amazing. I wonder how long it would take you to make the whole KSC? +rep to both you

well, we HAD that vision to begin with. and then we found out how long/how much work it took to do just the VAB
Looks fantastic! I wish I had building skills like that when I played Minecraft...
Impressive, it's always fun to see stuff that people build in Minecraft.

i'm not sure how many hours, but we basically spent 8 to 10 Saturdays with at least 2 or 3 people, sometime more, working several hours each Saturday, and then people working occasionally in between as well.

Making the X's inside was a pain for me. And I had to repair them when Fleet decided to use tnt to blow up the roof because he built it too low.

But the main problem was getting stone, of all things

Many snowball fights occurred inside

And yes I helped too

Kekekeke...

Great show, boys. That takes some persistence.
Well, with the new update, you can blow up the VAB . . .

I'm not a fan or a player of Minecraft, but I know the game from watching my nephew playing it.

Just one word: Amazing!!!!

Ok, 2 words: Well done!

p.s.

Why not building a rocket and smash it?

Making the X's inside was a pain for me. And I had to repair them when Fleet decided to use tnt to blow up the roof because he built it too low.

But the main problem was getting stone, of all things

Many snowball fights occurred inside

And yes I helped too

I forgot about that. So yeah, we did some minor VAB blowing up there at one point to fix some errors

I can't even describe my amazement...

As for me, I couldn't even make the plans for a decent model of the VAB(and forget about a realist scale).

And I wouldn't even have the patience to make it.

How did you made that?!

Excuse my ignorance, but I don't play minecraft so I don't know how hard that was.

Still it looks nice and the video is entertaining. I'm happy to see the VAB comes equipped with all the wonderful windows and doors

Ah! I just watched this on YouTube! I used to build things in MC so I know how long this type of thing can take. Where you using World Edit or just vanilla? Awesome job either way.

PS if you ever build the R&D center I'd be hip for helping out... I could probably even stream it/join your Skype.

Ah! I just watched this on YouTube! I used to build things in MC so I know how long this type of thing can take. Where you using World Edit or just vanilla? Awesome job either way.

PS if you ever build the R&D center I'd be hip for helping out... I could probably even stream it/join your Skype.

it was just vanilla survival (+flying b/c we had bukkit + essentials and I thought we should at least be able to do that much )

Survival?

Breaking news! Minecraftia now has a space program, and the rocket hanger has been constructed. In totally unrelated news, the entire area around the hanger has been strip mined of all materials.

Impressive! Me, I can barely build a nice-looking house in Creative.

Breaking news! Minecraftia now has a space program, and the rocket hanger has been constructed. In totally unrelated news, the entire area around the hanger has been strip mined of all materials.

Haha, yeah basically

it was just vanilla survival (+flying b/c we had bukkit + essentials and I thought we should at least be able to do that much )

Vanilla?! That's insane! Amazing job.
